description:
Bonobono used to have a rock with a funny shape. He put it somewhere safe, but forgot where that was. He remembers that he called the rock Peijin, so Bonobono writes the name in the ground so he won`t forget. But he realizes that in order to never forget, he can`t leave that place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku ga Mukashi Motte Ita Mono
ボクが昔もっていたもの
